name: Yeet or be Youghted
description:
Keyboard Controls:

A,D to move
S to crouch
W to jump
Space Bar / Mouse 1 to use the Yeet Gauntlet

Xbox Controls:

Dpad Left and Right to move
Dpad Down to crouch
B to jump
A to to use the Yeet Gauntlet

--------------------------------------------

Created for Basic Block Jam https://itch.io/jam/single-block-jam.

--------------------------------------------

Use the Yeet Gauntlet to catapult yourself to the door!

Press Up/W at the door to advance to the next room.
